AT.name: Animal Crossing™: Happy Home Designer
AT.description: In diesem Spiel hast du die Möglichkeit, deine Dekorationsfähigkeiten auf die Probe zu stellen und wundervolle Wohnungen für deine Lieblingscharaktere aus Animal Crossing zu entwerfen. Du musst den Bedürfnissen der tierischen Bewohner Gehör schenken und kannst einen Stil sowie die passenden Möbelstücke auswählen, um wahre Traumdomizile zu gestalten. Dieses Spiel kann Produktplatzierungen und Werbung enthalten.

movies.name: Animal Crossing: Happy Home Designer: Käpten
Animal Crossing: Happy Home Designer: Melinda
Animal Crossing: Happy Home Designer : Fatima
Animal Crossing: Happy Home Designer : Monika

Animal Crossing: Happy Home Designer : Tom Nook
Animal Crossing: Happy Home Designer: DJ K.K.
Animal Crossing: Happy Home Designer: Mimmi
AC: Happy Home Designer: Trailer zum Verkaufsstart
Animal Crossing: Happy Home Designer: Einführungsvideo

AU.name: Animal Crossing™: Happy Home Designer
AU.description: In this game, put your decorating skills to the test and design wonderful homes to suit all your favourite Animal Crossing characters. Listen to each animal's request, pick a style and finish it off with furniture to turn their dream home into reality. This game may contain product placement and advertising.

BG.name: Animal Crossing™: Happy Home Designer
BG.description: In this game, put your decorating skills to the test and design wonderful homes to suit all your favourite Animal Crossing characters. Listen to each animal's request, pick a style and finish it off with furniture to turn their dream home into reality. This game may contain product placement and advertising.

BE.name: Animal Crossing™: Happy Home Designer
BE.description: Dans ce jeu, mettez vos talents de décorateur à l'épreuve et concevez des intérieurs adaptés à tous vos personnages Animal Crossing préférés. Écoutez les requêtes de chaque animal, choisissez un style et ajoutez des meubles pour faire de leur maison de rêve une réalité. Ce jeu peut contenir de la publicité et du placement de produit.

ES.name: Animal Crossing™: Happy Home Designer
ES.description: En este juego podrás poner tus habilidades para la decoración a prueba y diseñar hermosos hogares que dejen encantados a tus personajes favoritos de Animal Crossing. Atiende a sus peticiones, elige un estilo y selecciona los muebles perfectos para hacer realidad la casa de sus sueños. Este juego puede contener publicidad indirecta y anuncios de productos.

IT.name: Animal Crossing™: Happy Home Designer
IT.description: In questo gioco, metti alla prova le tue capacità di decoratore e progetta case fantastiche, perfette per tutti i tuoi personaggi preferiti di Animal Crossing. Ascolta le richieste di ogni animale, scegli uno stile e completa l'opera con l'arredamento ideale per trasformare in realtà la sua casa da sogno. In questo gioco potrebbero apparire pubblicità e pubblicità indiretta.

NL.name: Animal Crossing™: Happy Home Designer
NL.description: In deze game kun je laten zien hoe goed jouw smaak is en de prachtigste woningen ontwerpen voor je favoriete Animal Crossing-personages. Luister naar de wensen van elk dier, kies een stijl en zet de puntjes op de i met meubels om het huis van hun dromen te maken. Deze game bevat mogelijk reclame voor andere producten.

PT.name: Animal Crossing™: Happy Home Designer
PT.description: Neste jogo testas as tuas capacidades de decoração e desenhas casas para todas as tuas personagens de Animal Crossing preferidas. Presta atenção aos pedidos de cada animal, escolhe um estilo e termina-o com mobiliário para transformares os seus sonhos de decoração em realidade. Este jogo pode incluir colocação de produtos e publicidade.

RU.name: Animal Crossing™: Happy Home Designer
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. В этой игре вам предстоит продемонстрировать свое чувство прекрасного и разрабатывать дизайн домов для ваших любимых персонажей Animal Crossing. Выслушайте пожелания каждого животного, подберите нужный стиль и мебель, чтобы создать идеальный дом. Эта игра может содержать продакт-плейсмент и рекламу.
